title.rendered: Spend Less Time Designing And Installing, More Time Living: Eldorado Outdoor Line Debuts Five New Signature Kitchen Designs

content.rendered:
A gorgeous, luxury kitchen can be the focal point of any outdoor space, but deciding on design and construction hassles can be daunting. There are so many possibilities that many homeowners skip important elements or the project all together. Taking the guesswork out of the equation, Eldorado Outdoor™ is making it easier than ever to realize the perfect outdoor retreat with the introduction of five new Signature Kitchens.

Eldorado Outdoor Signature Kitchens are configurations pre-designed with functionality in mind. Additionally, the Signature Kitchens offer homeowners the ability to customize outdoor cabinets by selecting from eight Eldorado Stone profiles and specifying the appliance brands and countertops of their choice. Each Signature Kitchen comes pre-packaged with all of the cabinets, hardware, end-caps and components necessary to quickly and easily assemble.

Signature Kitchens are available in a variety of configurations that begin with Metropolitan™, the perfect design and a popular formation for smaller spaces. The Coastal Ranch™ design is the most inclusive, offering all the elements a passionate outdoor host desires. Design elements including raised bar counters, ample room for food prepping and ultimate flexibility for appliance placement helps craft the ultimate entertaining space. The Sierra™, Carolina™ and ParkView™ configurations round out the collection with designs in sizes in-between. Architects, designers and homeowners will have access to a variety of pre-planned possibilities, and will enjoy the simplicity of installation and ease of true customization.
